content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-10.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position (-10.0, 0.0)
- Connected to lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)
- Connected to assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5)

### Lab at position(-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5) connected to steam engine at position (-10.0, 0.0)

### Assembling machine at position(-21.5, 25.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (-21.5, 25.5) connected to steam engine at position (-10.0, 0.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing boiler
- Ensure the target location is clear of other entities before attempting to place a boiler. 

### Errors when using electricity group
- Avoid attempting to remove or manipulate electricity groups without confirming their attributes and status.

### Errors when connecting entities
- Verify that the entities you are trying to connect are within range and properly powered before making connections. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
